from schedule
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update schedule
schedule_id = #{record.scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_id = #{record.roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name = #{record.deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sdate = #{record.sdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

local_day = #{record.localDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
local_day_of_week = #{record.localDayOfWeek,jdbcType=INTEGER},
local_shhmm = #{record.localShhmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
local_ehhmm = #{record.localEhhmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
local_duration = #{record.localDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sensor_cnt = #{record.sensorCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_sensor = #{record.totalSensor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_detect = #{record.totalDetect,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chk_duration = #{record.chkDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{record.result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cdate = #{record.cdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_id = #{record.locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
error_cnt = #{record.errorCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result_date = #{record.resultDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
